basic_info.description: Hello! I’m Brian Kasprzyk, I’m a Full Stack Software Developer in training and will be looking for work in the coming three months. I chose to pursue this because I’m detail oriented and I love to really dig into projects.  The way I learn is by building a mental map to navigate in my head, which turned out to be not unlike computer language, so we have been getting along quite fashionably. I love science. Space and dinosaurs anything they play on PBS Nova. I decided I would best contribute to humankind's scientific understanding by learning how to engineer software to aid us in the exploration and understanding of the universe around. This passion for exploration helps me adapt to any project I take part in, and ensures that I find a way to bring consistent contribution towards the common effort. I have a mixed history and a varied professional skill that brings unique experience to any team.

projects.title: Bargains of the Lost
projects.description: 201 Level Development of Text based trivia game where the user is presented with a series of questions and has to get a certain amount correct to win the game. Built with VS Code, Git, GitHub, Miro, Trello, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, featuring innerHTML, local storage, CSS animation.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
